title: 2007 Rice Owls football team
text: The 2007 Rice Owls football team represented <a href="Rice%20University">Rice University</a> in the <a href="2007%20NCAA%20Division%20I%20FBS%20football%20season">2007 NCAA Division I FBS college football season</a>. The Owls, led by 1st year head coach <a href="David%20Bailiff">David Bailiff</a>, played their home games at <a href="Rice%20Stadium%20%28Rice%20University%29">Rice Stadium</a> in <a href="Houston">Houston, Texas</a>. Rice finished the season 3–9 and 3–5 in <a href="Conference%20USA">CUSA</a> play.
